name: Theatrhythm Dragon Quest
description:
Theatrhythm Dragon Quest is an arcade game developed by indieszero. It came out on 26-03-2015. It was published by Square Enix. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Theatrhythm Dragon Quest is available on Nintendo 3DS.
It was produced by Ichiro Hazama. Koichi Sugiyama scored the game.
